ygData.messageBody:
*picks jaw up off the floor*

Whoever "Anonymous" is needs to be shot, hung, dragged through broken glass,
then shot a few more times.

---
gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org
"Linux... find out what you've been missing while
you've been rebooting Windows NT" - Infoworld

> From: Xpig18Nad@...
>
> I never usually post but I thought this must be mentioned. If you go to
the
> cazic-thule corner (www.cazic-thule.com) and look under raffle news you
will
> see some of the items up for raffle on Nov 2nd. Scroll down a bit and you
> will see gnomish fireworks (4) a spyglass, a collapsible fishing pole, and
> some other tinkered things. Obviously someone on my server knows how to
> tinker these items. I do not suggest you give up trying to hunt him out.
> Because I doubt he would tell you. What this means that if these were not
> given by GM's then tinkering is not broken and eventually we will be able
to
> tinker these things as soon as we find a logical recipe. Good luck.
